summary: "Planet of the Apes" is a popular science fiction franchise with movies, books, TV shows, and more. It started with a French book in 1963 and became famous for its 1968 movie adaptation. The story takes place in a future where smart apes rule over humans. There have been many movies, including sequels and remakes, with the latest ones released in 2011 and after. The series is known for its interesting themes and has made a lot of money worldwide. It has also influenced other movies and culture.
title: Planet of the Apes
